name: Mushroom Fajitas
description: Mushroom is a great fajita filling. It soaks up your cooking flavors and has a great texture.

recipeInstructions.text: Set a large sauté pan to medium-high heat. Pour in oil. Add mushrooms when pan is hot and cook for about 3-5 min, until all the liquid released by the mushrooms has evaporated and they are golden brown
recipeInstructions.name: Set a large sauté pan to medium-high heat. Pour in oil. Add mushrooms when pan is hot and cook for about 3-5 min, until all the liquid released by the mushrooms has evaporated and they are golden brown

recipeInstructions.text: Add onion into the pan and cook for 2-3 min. until slightly browned. Add garlic and peppers. Cook for 3-4 min. more or until the peppers are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add onion into the pan and cook for 2-3 min. until slightly browned. Add garlic and peppers. Cook for 3-4 min. more or until the peppers are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Place mushrooms back in the pan. Pour in soy sauce. Season with salt and pepper. Cook for 1-2 min.
recipeInstructions.name: Place mushrooms back in the pan. Pour in soy sauce. Season with salt and pepper. Cook for 1-2 min.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with tortillas, guacamole and roasted tomato salsa.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with tortillas, guacamole and roasted tomato salsa.

keywords: mushroom fajitas, vegan fajitas, vegetarian fajitas
